department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: The letter of intent is published to qualify a new OEM that can supply commercial brand of outboard motors, inboard motors or stern drives for the government users.
description: The letter of intent E60ML-230001/I is published to qualify any new Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM), other than the proposed OEMs, or up to two (2) Exclusive Distributors other than the proposed Exclusive Distributors capable to supply the 2024 models of its commercial brand of outboard motors, inboard motors or stern drives with their parts and accessories to Authorized Users (Federal Identified Users and Provincial/Territorial Identified Users) for deliveries across Canada, except areas subject to Constitutive Legal Agreements (CLAs), on an as-and-when requested basis from the date of standing offer to 31 August 2024.
tags: Gasoline Reciprocating Engines (Except Aircraft) and Components

full_summary:
### New Brand for Commercial Motor Products
#### Title
**English**: New Brand - Outboard Motors, Inboard Motors and Stern Drives (Contract Reference: PW-__ML-068-29144)
**French**: Nouvelle Marque - Moteurs hors-bord, à bord et en poupe (Référence de contrac: PW-__ML-068-29144)

#### Publication
**Publication Date**: August 16, 2023
**Publication Closing Date**: September 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

#### Tender Information
**Contract Reference**: PW-__ML-068-29144
**Solicitation Number**: E60ML-230001/I
**Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), ComSwitch MHisoDayCommunication Integrated Agreement (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (C-UKTCA)

#### Business Opportunity
A Letter of Interest (LOI) is being issued to qualify New Commercial Brands (NCB) of outboard motors, inboard motors, and stern drives for Authorized Users across Canada. NCBs are required to meet the qualification criteria listed in the LOI and must provide their commercial brand, capacity, and services across the country. The Authorized Users include federal and provincial/territorial identified users.

#### Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact:

Alex Haydock
Supply Officer
Public Works and Government Services Canada
Defence and Marine Procurement Branch
Place du Portage, Phase III, 6A2
11 Laurier Street
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Phone: (343) 598-1292
Email: alex.haydock@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information

The proposed OEMs and their commercial brands of outboard motors, inboard motors, or stern drives are:
Yamaha Motor Canada Ltd., Toronto, Ontario, Yamaha brand of outboard motors;
Mercury Marine Limited, Milton, Ontario, Mercury Marine brands of outboard motors, inboard motors, or stern drives; and
Suzuki Canada Inc., Richmond Hill, Ontario, Suzuki brand of outboard
